original_text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you, and ye need not that any man teach you: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things, and is truth, and is no lie, and even as it hath taught you, ye shall abide in him.
korean_text: 너희는 주께 받은 바 기름 부음이 너희 안에 거하나니 아무도 너희를 가르칠 필요가 없고 오직 그의 기름 부음이 모든 것을 너희에게 가르치며 또 참되고 거짓이 없으니 너희를 가르치신 그대로 주 안에 거하라

sentences.original_text: But the anointing which ye have received of him
and ye need not that any man teach you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 아무도 너희를 가르칠 필요가 없으니

sentences.original_text: but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 그와 같은 기름부음이 모든 것을 너희에게 가르치며

sentences.original_text: and even as it hath taught you
